name: The Cathedral: Allison's Diary
description: Two years later from "The Hospital" facts, you are interested in visiting the place where Rachel and Alfredo should have been buried. "The Cathedral" is the second chapter of the Allison's Diary horror saga. In the sacred cathedral of Sant'Andrea there is something frightening waiting to be discovered.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7-7700 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
